title: Ivy League Killer
description:
The killing of Thomas Gilbert Sr. and the arrest of his 30-year-old son Tommy divided Manhattan high society: Did Tommy Gilbert have a psychotic break, or was he a spoiled playboy who killed his dad for cutting his allowance?


Source materials for this episode cannot be listed here due to character limitations. For a full list of sources, please visit https://redcollarpodcast.com/
author: content@audiochuck.com (audiochuck)
